basic_info.name: Why to Join Gouthami Institute of Technology and Management for Women?

Section.name: About GITAMW
Section.description:
Gouthami Institute of Technology and Management for Women (GITMW), Kadapa, Andhra Pradesh was established with a noble intention of promoting technical edification in the deprived regions of Kadapa. The institution functions with a mission to put forward a holistic educational pattern to endow the educatee with a perfect blend of contemporary intelligence and outstanding human values. The vision of the institution is to create highly competent, motivated engineering and management proficient to contribute their skills in an ethical way to improve the standard of the nation.
